function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Measuring public attention and trust in official media related to COVID-19","Impact":"Low public attention and trust may lead to misinformation and non-compliance with protective measures","Mitigation":"Increase public awareness through targeted campaigns and transparent communication","Technologies":"Social media monitoring, public health apps, online surveys","People":"General public, government officials, public health organizations","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, media organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of embracement of protective behaviors","Impact":"Increase in the spread of the virus and higher risk of infection","Mitigation":"Public education campaigns to promote and explain protective behaviors, provision of resources such as face masks and hand sanitizers","Technologies":"Educational videos, infographics, online resources, mobile apps","People":"General public, healthcare workers, at-risk populations","Owner":"Public health organizations, government, community leaders"},{"Description":"Association of sociodemographic characteristics with public knowledge and protective behaviors","Impact":"Unequal distribution of knowledge and protective behaviors, leading to higher risk in certain groups","Mitigation":"Tailored education and support for at-risk groups, addressing social determinants of health","Technologies":"Data analytics for targeted interventions, community outreach programs, educational materials","People":"At-risk populations, healthcare providers, public health organizations","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, community organizations"}]}
